WorkItem.Description:
I'm trying to render the playing cards found on wikipedia (http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/b/bd/Playing_card_spade_J.svg)
Stable version (0.5.2) does render them, but the colors are wrong
Latest version (57272) throws an error because of the "tspan" elements in the svg file. If I disable SVGTextSpan.cs, the file renders, and the colors are better, but still not correct, and the value of my card (witch was in the tspan) is missing...

Comments.Message:
A little update : the tspan problem is solved in issue Id #10725
The svg is still not rendered correctly though...
The linked file contains invalid xml. The xlink:href attribute values are not correctly formed with url().
